#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long gcd(long long a,long long b)
{
    if(a==0)
        return b;
	else 
		return (gcd(b%a,a));
}
int main()
{
	long long  g,ans,t,n,m,total,o1,o2,e1,e2;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		
		cin>>n>>m;
		total=n*m;
		o1=(n+1)/2;
		o2=(m+1)/2;
		e1=(n)/2;
		e2=(m)/2;
		ans=o1*e2+o2*e1;
		g=gcd(total,ans);
		cout<<ans/g<<"/"<<total/g<<endl;		
	}
	return 0;
}
